name: Fleeting Shadow
desc:
You wrap yourself in shadow. Instead of your normal movement this turn, you can move in a straight line in any direction up to half your movement speed, up to three times. This movement ignores difficult terrain and can pass through creatures. Creatures can't spend AP as a response to this movement.

At the end of your turn, if you cannot fly and are above the ground, you fall to the ground.
author: CrusaderDroid
